data.1: I CALL TO WITNESS those who are sent consecutively,
data.3: And those that revive by quickening,
data.5: And those that bring down the Reminder
data.6: To end all argument or to warn.
data.7: What is promised will surely come to pass.
data.10: The mountains reduced to dust and blown away,
data.11: And when the time comes for raising the little girls (buried alive) --
data.12: For what day is that time fixed?
data.14: How will you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
data.15: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.16: Have We not destroyed the earlier generations?
data.17: So shall We make the later ones to follow them.
data.18: That is what We shall do to those who are guilty of crime.
data.19: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.20: Did We not create you from contemptible water?
data.21: Then We lodged you in a secure place (the womb)
data.23: Then We facilitated (your birth). How well do We calculate!
data.24: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.25: Have We not made the earth a repository
data.26: For the living and the dead,
data.27: And placed in it lofty and broad stablisers, and gave you sweet water to drink?
data.28: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.29: "Go to what you used to deny;
data.30: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
data.31: Neither shady nor protecting against the blazing Fire.
data.32: It will throw out sparks as logs of wood
data.34: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.35: They will not be able to speak that day,
data.36: Nor given leave to make excuses.
data.37: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.38: That will be the Day of Reckoning. Gathered will be (you) and the earlier (generations).
data.39: So if you have any plot to devise against Me, then devise it.
data.40: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.41: Those who take heed for themselves and fear God, will be amidst shade and springs of water,
data.42: And such fruits as they desire.
data.43: "Eat and drink with relish as reward for what you had done."
data.44: That is how We reward the good.
data.45: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.46: Eat and enjoy for a while: You are certainly sinners.
data.47: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.48: When it is said to them: "Bow in homage," they do not bow.
data.49: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
data.50: In what other lore after this will they then believe?
